result.title: Test Matrix Definition and Facility Upgrade for PHWR reference Reactor
result.description: Starting from the input provided by WP1, the following minimum set of operating parameters will be considered in the beginning in the test matrix for PHWR reference reactor: feedwater pressure in the secondary side of the Steam Generator, feedwater mass flow and temperature, Steam Generator water level and primary coolant temperature, as well as the DHR isolation condenser pressure and temperature. The parameters represent the starting point of facility upgrading able to ensure its integration in the safety system of PHWR. The appropriate instrumentation, components and layout as well as operation procedures will be provided.
